text: The 37th Young Artist Awards ceremony, presented by the Young Artist Association, honored excellence of young performers between the ages of 5 to 18 in the fields of film, television, theatre and the internet for the 2015 calendar year. Winners were announced on March 13, 2016, at the annual ceremony and banquet luncheon held in the Empire Ballroom of the Sportsmen's Lodge in Studio City, California. ==Winners and nominees== ★ Winners were announced on March 13, 2016. ===Best Performance in a Feature Film=== {| class="wikitable" style="width:100%;" |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%;"|Best Performance in a Feature Film – Leading Young Actor (10 and under) ! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%;"|Best Performance in a Feature Film – Leading Young Actress (13 and under) |- | valign="top"|★ Jared Breeze – The Boy * Carsen Warner – Lovesick * Jacob Tremblay – Room * Jakob Salvati – LIttle Boy * Kyle Catlett – The Young and Prodigious T.S. title: 37th Young Artist Awards
